mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Posts(user_no, post_title, post_content, post_write_datetime, post_check_hide, post_hits) VALUES (${num}, '${Post.title}', '${Post.content}', '${Post.writeDate}', false, 0)
mapper.update: update Posts set name='${name}' where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT post_no AS postNo, user_no AS userNo, post_title AS postTitle, post_content AS postContent, post_write_datetime AS postWriteDatetime, post_check_hide AS postCheckHide, post_hits AS postHits FROM Posts order by post_no limit #{rowCount} offset #{offset}
